title: Whole School Planning
other_title: Whole School Planning at Deer Park Secondary College
creator_contributor_role: Institute of Educational Administration, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/School management and organisation
description: Episode number 1 of Series "Case studies in effective schooling". Case studies in effective schooling presents first hand accounts of how individual schools have improved their effectiveness. The first episode, "Whole school planning" looks at planning as a manageable series of arrangements designed to involve all interested parties and to make the best use of limited resources. Deer Park Secondary College features in this case study.
